name: Hardest Bogart Movies Trivia Quiz | Humphrey Bogart | 10 Questions

questions.text: 'Treasure of the Sierra Madre' was one of Bogart's best movies. Who (along with Walter Huston) was his co-star?
questions.explanation:
Tim Holt.

	Good job by Holt - and by Bogart as Fred C. Dobbs

questions.text: Who played Bogart's romantic interest in 'The Maltese Falcon'?
questions.explanation:
Mary Astor.

	How many other movies with Mary Astor can you name?

questions.text: Who stole the letters of transit in 'Casablanca' and asked Bogart to keep them?
Who played Bogart's girlfriend in 'High Sierra'?
questions.explanation:
Ida Lupino.

	The others pop up in other Bogart movies - especially Bacall, of course.

questions.text: Bogart did a fine job as Captain Queeg in 'The Caine Mutiny'. Which one of the following was NOT in the movie?
questions.explanation:
Robert Ryan.

	Ferrer was a lawyer (as was E.G. Marshall). MacMurray and Johnson were naval officers.

questions.text: Bogart played a tough guy in 'Petrified Forest'. Who was the star of the movie?
In 'Key Largo', the shoe is on the other foot: Bogart plays a good guy who is menaced by a thug. Who plays the hoodlum?
questions.explanation:
Edward G. Robinson

	With Lionel Barrymore

questions.text: Which actress had a small role as the bookstore clerk in 'The Big Sleep'?
questions.explanation:
Dorothy Malone.

	Early in her career

questions.text: Which movie did NOT star Bogart?
questions.explanation:
Home From The Hill.

	'Hill' starred Robert Mitchum, George Peppard and George Hamilton

questions.text: Who played Bogart's buddy in 'To Have and Have Not'?
